```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = "#>",
```

dissem.in client

## Install

Development version

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ropenscilabs/dissem")
```

```{r}
library("dissem")
```

## single DOI

```{r}
diss("10.1016/j.paid.2009.02.013")
```

## many DOIs

```{r}
diss(c("10.1016/j.paid.2009.02.013", "10.1186/s40687-015-0044-7"))
```
